nodes.text: Arconese was the language of the Arcona species. The Arcona Hem Dazon spoke Arconese while he was in Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina in Mos Eisley spaceport on the planet Tatooine in 0 BBY.

Arconese first appeared in the 1977 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. It was first identified as Arconese in the video "Every Language in Star Wars" which released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel. The name originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity where it was first used in Alien Anthology, a 2001 supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
